revised_title: Investigating the Presence of Volatile Alcali in Putrefaction
tldr: The author conducts experiments on putrefaction and discovers the presence of volatile alcali throughout the process. The volatile alcali is found to be the basis of putrefaction, and its presence is essential to the process. The author also suggests that volatile alcali may be present in living bodies but cannot be used as antiseptics due to its stimulating quality.
